reviews.review_msg: Horrible teacher !! avoid at all cost !! has absolutly no compassion for students and very rude and disrespectful ...one of the worst teachers i have encounter in my psychology years

This is an excellent professor. He is knowledgeable and highly interested in the material he teaches. Make no doubt, the material looks easy, but his exams are extremely hard. If you don't study hard, attend the lectures, then you will FAIL~!! nobodies fault except for the student who didn't take the course seriously
He was very interested in the subject matter and was a nice guy. Come to class do the readings.

If you ike lowering our GPA for some reason if you like wasting your money take a class with Dr. Turnbull. He's boring and unhelpful. His exams are difficult and questions are incomprehensible. I seriously think he should be banned from teaching or at least this useless, irrelavant course should not be taught at all. AVOID AVOID AVOID

This "psychology" course presents information that has no practical value or relevance to everyday life. The text (written by the prof) is dry and uninformative. The tests are difficult and require precise answers to vague questions. The assignment is easy but only worth 15% of your grade. Guaranteed to lower your GPA. This class is not scaled.

Horrible class. Textbook is boring and overly complicated; lectures are boring and unclear; lecture notes are made available ahead of time but he jumps around so much you can't follow. Strictly theorectical, not at all practical. I stopped going after the midterm. TA tried her best to make it interesting. Would not recommed this course.

This is by far the most boring psychology class (if you can call it that) in the whole department.  The material is confusing and mostly irrelevent to everyday life unless you enjoy analyzing every word that is said by the people around you.  The exams are not clear.    AVOID!

The exams were extremely difficult and the questions were not clear on what he was asking.  The midterm grades were so low tha the TA had to remark, plus give everyone an extra 5 marks.  This course will lower your GPA guarenteed!!!
